name: The 3rd Annual 2012 International Conference on Computer Science and Information Technology (ICCSIT 2012)
description: The 3rd Annual 2012 International Conference on Computer Science and Information Technology (ICCSIT 2012) will be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on 15-16 December 2012. The conference is organized by the International Association of Computer Science and Information Technology (IACSIT).
